about.name: Ray Lee
about.intro_1_title: I am a senior full stack developer, with a wide range of backend skills, and can be effective in any position
about.intro_1_description: including but not limited to machine building, environment building, development, database construction, CI/CD pipeline construction, database maintenance, cloud services, etc.
about.intro_2_title: focus on backend, but not limited to backend
about.intro_2_description: familiar with HTML & CSS & JavaScript & React. The front end of this Blog is developed using React.
about.intro_3_description: quickly get started with new and old technologies and enjoy learning.
about.intro_4_title: have experience in developing distributed services
about.intro_4_description: improve service capacity and stability through Load Balancer, Instance Group, Auto Scaling, Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL, Redis, etc.
about.intro_5_title: refuse to write code that causes performance bottlenecks
about.intro_5_description: familiar with algorithms, evaluate the time complexity of the code, and avoid performance bottlenecks.
about.intro_6_description: make the code more readable through comments, naming, and modularization.
about.intro_7_description: able to read English documents and communicate with foreigners, allowing projects to adopt cutting-edge technology.
about.intro_8_description: share knowledge to make it more solid. I run my own Blog to share technical articles and also share technical articles on Medium.
about.skill_description: The skill description is a bit abstract. You can understand my skills better through the articles I have written.
